movie.title: Live Nude Girls
movie.actors: Dana Delany, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Stevenson, Laila Robins
movie.plot: Georgina throws a sleepover party for her friend Jamie, a moderately successful actress, on the night of Jamie's fiancee's bachelor party. Jill, Jamie, Marcy, Rachel, and Georgina have been friends since childhood, and as the evening progresses they talk about a variety of topics: Georgina's heterosexual fantasies and her uncertainties about Chris, her live-in lover; Jamie's doubts and insecurities about marriage; and all of their attitudes toward sex and sexual fantasies.
